name: An Absolute truth
description:
'An Absolute truth' is a small surrealist linear story written and drawn by me !

It's the simple product of my own imagination in its rawest form! As I simply wrote the story as it came to my mind, without any thinking of if what I just wrote was logical, or even written in a understandable english (As my main language is french), and I drew the  characters and the backgrounds using all kind of aesthetic who inspired me enough !

I also believe I should share some important informations regarding the current content of the game: 

even if this game use the form of a visual Novel,  This small game is actually more  a linear story with one direct path without choices.

And for now , only the 'chapter 1' of the story is available  (who count at least 10-15 minutes of story for now)  even if more chapters will came out in the future (when i'll get the time to write them)

all things asides, I still hope you'll enjoy and have fun with this little window  that let you view  the surrealist chaos of that  subconscious of mine,  And feel free to leave your current thoughts about what you think about all this!

(Also: list of the music I used in this project for now:

Omori OST - 135 Calm

Mario Odyssey  OST - Tostarena night
